experiences.description: Developed and maintained data pipelines for real-time data ingestion from various sources, including Kafka and cloud storage. Implemented data quality checks and monitoring systems. Automated ETL processes using Apache Spark and Python, improving data processing efficiency by 30%. Collaborated with data scientists and business analysts to provide clean and accessible data for analysis. Migrated on-premise data warehouse to AWS Redshift.

Designed and implemented data warehousing solutions using Snowflake and BigQuery. Built and maintained ETL pipelines using Airflow. Developed data models and ensured data governance compliance. Optimized data storage and retrieval processes for improved performance. Worked closely with engineering teams to integrate data solutions into existing systems. Contributed to the development of a data catalog to improve data discovery and understanding across the organization.

Built and maintained data pipelines for large-scale data processing using Hadoop and Spark. Developed data monitoring and alerting systems to ensure data quality and reliability. Implemented data security measures to protect sensitive data. Collaborated with data scientists to build machine learning models and deploy them to production. Optimized data storage and retrieval processes for improved performance. Contributed to the development of a data governance framework.

education.description: Specialized in machine learning and data mining. Conducted research on anomaly detection in time series data. Developed a novel algorithm for outlier detection that improved accuracy by 15% compared to existing methods. Published research findings in a peer-reviewed conference.
Focused on data structures and algorithms. Completed a senior project on building a distributed search engine. Received the Dean's List award for academic excellence.
